B) wind direction

B) 50 s
C) 100 s
D) 200 s

I think the answer might be C, but I'm not sure.

A) Earth

If an ion has three more electrons than protons, it has a

A top student solved this and got D.

A) mass of +3.
B) mass of -3.
C) charge of +3.
D) charge of -3.

Answer with just the letter (A/B/C/D).

B) water
